class.name: bbr.b2b.regional.logistic.vendors.entities.Vendor
class.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor as vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE vd.id IN (:vendorids)

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor AS vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE vd.id IN (:vendorids)

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor as vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE vd.rut LIKE :code AND vd.id IN (:vendorids)

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor as vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE UPPER(vd.name) LIKE :name AND vd.id IN (:vendorids)

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor as vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE vd.code LIKE :code AND vd.id IN (:vendorids)

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor AS vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE UPPER(vd.name) LIKE :name AND vd.id IN (:vendorids)

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor AS vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE vd.code LIKE :code AND vd.id IN (:vendorids)

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor AS vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE vd.rut LIKE :code AND vd.id IN (:vendorids)

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor AS vd JOIN logistica.dating AS dt ON dt.vendor_id = vd.id JOIN logistica.reserve AS rs ON rs.id = dt.id LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE rs.when1 >= :since AND rs.when1 < :until AND rs.location_id = :locationid

SELECT DISTINCT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor AS vd JOIN logistica.order AS o ON vd.id = o.vendor_id LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON hc.vendor_id = vd.id WHERE o.expiration >= :since AND o.expiration <= :until

SELECT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor AS vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON vd.id = hc.vendor_id WHERE hc.vendor_id IS NOT NULL AND vd.domestic IS TRUE

SELECT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate, CASE WHEN hc.courier_id IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS courier FROM logistica.vendor AS vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON vd.id = hc.vendor_id WHERE hc.vendor_id IS NULL AND vd.domestic IS TRUE

SELECT vd.id, vd.rut, vd.number, vd.name, vd.tradename, vd.address, vd.phone, vd.commune, vd.city, vd.email, vd.fax, vd.code, vd.domestic, vd.lastbulknumber, vd.logisticscode, vd.gln, vd.firstvevcddate, vd.firstvevpddate FROM logistica.vendor AS vd LEFT JOIN logistica.hiredcourier AS hc ON vd.id = hc.vendor_id WHERE hc.vendor_id IS NULL AND vd.domestic IS TRUE AND vd.name LIKE :name
SELECT id FROM logistica.vendor WHERE firstvevcddate >= :since AND firstvevcddate < :until
SELECT id FROM logistica.vendor WHERE firstvevpddate >= :since AND firstvevpddate < :until
